lead_paragraph: SIMON--Phyllis L.,age 94, passed away peacefully June 1. She was beloved by all who knew her. Born Valentine's Day February 14, 1922 to Sam and Flora Lieber, she grew up in Mt. Vernon, NY. In 1943, Phyllis married Hyman G. "Hy" Simon. They were happily married for 54 years, had three sons and resided in Great Neck, NY. Phyllis is survived by her loving brother Stephen Lieber. his family, as well as her three devoted son and wives: Kenneth and Andi, Geoffrey and Andrea, and Robert and Teresa; six grandchildren, and four great- grandchildren. Funeral services: 10:00am, Sunday, June 5 at Riverside-Nassau North Chapel, Great Neck, NY. Donations to: Brain & Behavior Research Foundation (website: bbrfoundation.org) 1/3
